<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1948</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">HolocaustMemorial Museum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">HolocaustMemorial Museum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musée de HolocaustMemorial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Museu De HolocaustMemorial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Museo Di HolocaustMemorial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">HolocaustMemorial μουσείο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Museo De HolocaustMemorial</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online internet activity for advanced English students where they visit the Online Holocaust Memorial Museum, and write on topics presented to them.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">museum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">memorial</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Internet-Online-Dienst für hochentwickelte 
englische Kursteilnehmer, in denen sie das Onlineholocaust 
Erinnerungsmuseum besichtigen und schreiben auf die Themen, die ihnen 
dargestellt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité en ligne d'Internet pour les 
étudiants anglais avançés où ils visitent le musée Holocauste 
commémoratif en ligne, et écrivent sur des sujets présentés à 
eux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade em linha do Internet para os 
estudantes ingleses avançados onde visitam o museu memorial em linha 
de Holocaust, e escreve nos tópicos apresentados a eles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività in linea del Internet per gli allievi
inglesi avanzati in cui visitano il museo commemorativo in linea di 
Holocaust e scrive sui soggetti presentati loro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα Διαδικτύου για 
τους προηγμένους αγγλικούς σπουδαστές όπου επισκέπτονται το σε 
απευθείας σύνδεση αναμνηστικό μουσείο ολοκαυτώματος, και γράφει 
στα θέματα που παρουσιάζονται σε τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad en línea del Internet para los 
estudiantes ingleses avanzados donde visitan el museo conmemorativo en
línea de Holocaust, y escribe en los asuntos presentados a ellos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
